Uses of Class
com.quinsoft.zeidon.ZeidonException

  • Packages that use ZeidonException 
    Package Description
    com.quinsoft.zeidon
    Provides all the standard classes and interfaces necessary for client applications written in Zeidon.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler
    Provides all the implementations of Zeidon DB handlers.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.objectdefinition
    The classes that are used at runtime to define Zeidon LODs and applications.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe
    Provides the standard Java implementation of the com.quinsoft.zeidon interfaces.

    • Uses of ZeidonException in com.quinsoft.zeidon

      Subclasses of ZeidonException in com.quinsoft.zeidon 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DuplicateRootException
      Thrown when committing a new root entity triggers a duplicate key error.
      class  HiddenAttributeException
      This exception is thrown when an application attempts to reference a hidden attribute by name.
      class  HiddenCursorException 
      class  InvalidAttributeConversionException 
      class  InvalidAttributeValueException 
      class  InvalidComparisonException
      Thrown when an attempt is made to compare an attribute with an incompatible type.
      class  InvalidTaskException
      This exception is thrown when code tries to use a view that belongs to a task that has been dropped.
      class  InvalidViewException 
      class  MaxCardinalityException 
      class  NullCursorException
      An attempt was made to access a cursor that is null.
      class  ObjectConstraintException 
      class  OutOfScopeException
      An attempt was made to access a cursor that is out of scope.
      class  PessimisticLockingException
      Thrown by activates if the DB can't acquire a pessimistic lock for an OI.
      class  RequiredAttributeException
      Thrown by validateSubobject(), this indicates a required attribute is null.

      class  SubobjectValidationException
